results.title: The effects of dapagliflozin, metformin or exercise on glycaemic variability in overweight or obese individuals with prediabetes (the PRE-D Trial): a multi-arm, randomised, controlled trial.
results.text_hl: The effects of @CHEMICAL_dapagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C529054 @@@dapagliflozin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ or exercise on glycaemic variability in @DISEASE_Overweight @DISEASE_MESH:D050177 @@@overweight@@@ or @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obese@@@ individuals with @DISEASE_Prediabetic_State @DISEASE_MESH:D011236 @@@prediabetes@@@ (the @<m>DISEASE_Myasthenic_Syndromes_Congenital</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020294 @@@PRE-D@@@ Trial): a multi-arm, randomised, controlled trial.

citations.NLM: Færch K, Blond MB, Bruhn L, Amadid H, Vistisen D, Clemmensen KKB, Vainø CTR, Pedersen C, Tvermosegaard M, Dejgaard TF, Karstoft K, Ried-Larsen M, Persson F, Jørgensen ME. The effects of dapagliflozin, metformin or exercise on glycaemic variability in overweight or obese individuals with prediabetes (the PRE-D Trial): a multi-arm, randomised, controlled trial. Diabetologia. 2021 Jan;64(1):42-55. PMID: 33064182
